headline: PNC Financial's Branch Expansion Push: A Smart Growth Move?
summary: PNC's $2B plan to open 300 branches by 2030 aims to boost growth, deepen customer ties, and expand its U.S. footprint.

headline: 'That World Has Changed': Alex Gorsky on Shift to Regionalization
summary: Alex Gorsky, board director for Apple, IBM, and JPMorgan Chase, discusses the end of the 30-year globalization era as businesses begin to take a more regionalized approach.

raw.headline: 'That World Has Changed': Alex Gorsky on Shift to Regionalization

headline: Morgan Stanley joins rivals in rolling out private company research, memo shows
summary: (Reuters) -Morgan Stanley launched a dedicated private company research page on Tuesday, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters,​ as investors' interest in high-growth startups rises.  Wall Street heavyweights have increasingly ‌ventured into research coverage on privately held companies this year as some of the world's most valuable startups, ‌including ChatGPT-parent OpenAI and Elon Musk's SpaceX, have stayed away from going public for longer than similar companies in the past.  In July, JPMorgan Chase, the largest U.S. bank by assets, began publishing research notes on prominent private companies shaping industries, and ⁠rival Citigroup followed days later with ‌a focus on rapidly growing tech firms.

headline: SoFi rolls out crypto trading for retail customers
summary: Fintech bank SoFi rolled out crypto trading to retail customers on Tuesday, setting the pace as the first of several large national US banks planning similar moves. SoFi previously gave customers the ability to buy, sell, and hold crypto through its app, but it agreed to shutter that service two years ago to obtain — and keep — approval for its national banking license.

raw.headline: SoFi rolls out crypto trading for retail customers

headline: JPMorgan Announces Cash Distributions for the JPMorgan ETFs
summary: TORONTO, Nov. 11, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- J. P. Morgan Asset Management (JPMAM)* today announced the final October 2025 cash distributions for the below listed JPMorgan ETFs. The JPMorgan ETFs trade on the Toronto Stock Exchange (TSX). Unitholders of record on November 18, 2025 will receive cash distributions payable on November 24, 2025. Details of the “per unit” distributions are as follows: JPMorgan ETF nameTicker symbolDistribution per unit ($)Payment frequencyJPMorgan US Ultra-Short Income

headline: JPMorgan and DBS Bank Team Up on Cross-Border Tokenised Deposit Framework
summary: JPMorgan’s Kinexys and DBS Bank plan an interoperability system for tokenised deposits, linking their blockchain networks for 24/7 cross-border settlements.

headline: Is the Stock Market Open Today? Here Are the Trading Hours for Veterans Day.
summary: November is nearly halfway over—and investors have a lot to process.  Earnings from some of the biggest names in tech, including  Palantir  have started rolling in, as investors continue to grapple with concerns over high valuations.  Now, Veterans Day has arrived.

headline: Is JPMorgan a Bargain After Recent Gains and Digital Banking Expansion?
summary: Wondering if JPMorgan Chase is a bargain or already priced for perfection? You are not alone; investors are keeping a close eye on its value story. The stock has gained 2.4% in the last week, 5.3% over the last month, and has climbed an impressive 32% year-to-date. This performance underscores renewed optimism and possibly some shifting risk views. Recent news has focused on JPMorgan Chase's strategic moves in digital banking and high-profile dealmaking, both of which have contributed to its...
